common.q1: What is the difficulty level of the project?
common.q2: Were you able to meet the deadline of this week?
common.q3: Were the project updates communicated effectively within the team this week?
common.q4: Was the workload efficiently balanced in this project?
common.q5: Rate the quality of work delivered by your team this week.

architect.q6: How effectively did the solution align with the project requirements?
architect.q7: Is there any additional support or resources needed to improve the performance?
architect.q8: Did the components promote reusability, maintainability and scalability?

intern.q6: Were feedbacks given to you to improve your performance?
intern.q7: Were there any challenges or obstacles that you faced during the project?
intern.q8: Would you recommend any specific areas of focus to improve your performance during the internship?
